tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.2.2.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP16 君は君のままで, Kimi wa Kimi no mama de)
programme.desc: "Humanity must not venture into space..." Kanata and the others struggle to take in those words, but just then the small monster Spinnie appears, and a TPU all-member operation begins to capture it. After all of their plans to capture it fail and Spinnie makes fun of him, Kanata vents by saying something horrible to Ryuumon...

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP20 Lord Ragon らごんさま, Ragon-sama)
programme.desc: An incident of an attacking from an unidentified monster takes place in a modern city, built where it which was once an ocean, Wadatsumi City!! Kaizaki and Ichika are immediately sent to investigate. The pair find a suspicious old woman, a mysterious girl, a crowd wearing peculiar masks, and a strange green creature. Is this a place where myterious events gather?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP10. Here Comes the Space Pirate! 宇宙海賊登場, Uchū Kaizoku Tōjō)
programme.desc: The space pirate, Alien Barossa sneaks into STORAGE to retrieve King Joe! This space pirate is known for using various robbed tools and weapons from space and is a powerful enemy! In addition, King Joe is about to move again! Can Haruki stop this pirate?

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP11. What Must Be Defended, 守るべきもの, Mamorubeki mono)
programme.desc: SSA-3 King Joe STORAGE Custom is finally complete! With weapons equipped to every inch of its body, this super robot wields tremendous power. Meanwhile, Red King appears before STORAGE. It seems, however, that this Red King has a secret...

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP12. The Cry of Life, 叫ぶ命, Sakebu Inochi)
programme.desc: Ten years ago, a monster crashed to Earth and fell into a deep sleep. Now that monster, Grigio Raiden, has awakened! Z faces off against the monster, but something is wrong with Haruki... King Joe STORAGE Custom fights hard to follow the lackluster Z. How will this battle end?

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP13. I'll Feast on Medals!, メダルいただきます!, Medaru Itadakimasu!)
programme.desc: With the sudden appearance of the Four-Dimensional Monster Bullton, the STORAGE base is thrown into chaos! Time and space become warped and twisted, transforming the STORAGE base into a dimensional prison. Meanwhile, Haruki is confronted with a mysterious phenomenon!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP14. Four-Dimensional Capriccio, 四次元狂騒曲, Yojigen Kyōsō-kyoku)
programme.desc: The space pirate, Alien Barossa sneaks into STORAGE to retrieve King Joe! This space pirate is known for using various robbed tools and weapons from space and is a powerful enemy! In addition, King Joe is about to move again! Can Haruki stop this pirate?

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP15. A Warrior's Duty, 戦士の使命, Senshi no Shimei)
programme.desc: Emergency contact from Ultraman Geed! It seems that a distortion is created in the universe, and a void monster, Greeza, who returns everything to nothing, appears. We need new power to face this threat! Yes, the strongest figure of Ultraman Z is born here now!

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP11)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 3: The Cocoon of Fear (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第3章 恐怖の繭」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai San Shō: Kyoufu no Mayu)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP12)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 4: Revival of The Hero (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第4章 復活の英雄」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Yon Shō: Fukkatsu no Eiyū)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP13)
programme.desc: Ultraman Saga - Chapter 5: The Real Fight (ウルトラマンサーガ 「第5章 本当の戦い」, Urutoraman Sāga - Dai Go Shō: Hontō no Tatakai)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP14)
programme.desc: Ultraman Mebius Battle File (ウルトラマンメビウスバトルファイル, Urutoraman Mebiusu Batoru Fairu): The only episode to not be largely re-used from the two Ultraman Retsuden seasons, this episode showcases Ultraman Mebius Gaiden: Ghost Rebirth. In newly-recorded footage, Rei makes a brief appearance at the end.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP15)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Chapter 1: The Rebellion of Belial (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「第１章 反逆のベリアル」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Dai Ichi Shō: Hangyaku no Beriaru)

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP15. A Warrior's Duty, 戦士の使命, Senshi no Shimei)
programme.desc: Emergency contact from Ultraman Geed! It seems that a distortion is created in the universe, and a void monster, Greeza, who returns everything to nothing, appears. We need new power to face this threat! Yes, the strongest figure of Ultraman Z is born here now!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP16. The Lion's Cry 獅子の声, Shishi no Koe)
programme.desc: The day has come for Horoboros, a monster that Yuka saw as a child, to awaken from its long slumber! The key to appeasing the raging Horoboros lies in a mysterious word recorded in an ancient document. Yuka sets out to decipher this writing, but Kaburagi's dark power is reaching out to Horoboros...!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP17.Beliarok ベリアロク, Beriaroku)
programme.desc: The Space Pirate, Alien Barossa, has returned! Alien Barossa is determined to steal Ultraman Z's new weapon. Beliarok. Our hero cannot allow Beliarok's hidden power to fall into the hands of an evil alien. With Juggler also in the mix. the battle for the mystic sword begins!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP18. Rechallenge from the Year 2020 2020年の再挑戦, Nisen Nijū-nen no Sai Chōsen)
programme.desc: While investigating the curious case of a vanishing monster. Haruki meets Kaori, a mysterious woman glaring at an old ferris wheel. Meanwhile, people are going missing from the town one after another...

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP19. The Last Hero 最後の勇者, Saigo no Yūsha)
programme.desc: The sky has shattered like glass! From the alternate dimension on the other side, a terrible monster Baraba appeared! As Ultraman Z and the others struggle in the face of Baraba's persistent attacks, Ultraman Ace rushes to the scene for help!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP20. To Care and What Lies Beyond 想い、その先に, Omoi, Sono Sakini)
programme.desc: The Artificial Life Form M1, created by Chief Mechanic Kojiro Inaba’s daughter Ruri, has malfunctioned and become gigantic! M1 doesn’t have bad intentions, but like this, it can do some serious damage! STORAGE puts a major operation into motion in order to stop M1 before it reaches the metropolitan area. Will they be able to save M1?!

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP14)
programme.desc: Ultraman Mebius Battle File (ウルトラマンメビウスバトルファイル, Urutoraman Mebiusu Batoru Fairu): The only episode to not be largely re-used from the two Ultraman Retsuden seasons, this episode showcases Ultraman Mebius Gaiden: Ghost Rebirth. In newly-recorded footage, Rei makes a brief appearance at the end.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP15)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Chapter 1: The Rebellion of Belial (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「第１章 反逆のベリアル」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Dai Ichi Shō: Hangyaku no Beriaru)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP16)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Chapter 2: Rei and Mebius (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「第２章 レイとメビウス」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Dai Ni Shō: Rei to Mebiusu)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP17)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Chapter 3: The Monster Graveyard Battle (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「第３章 怪獣墓場の決戦」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Dai San Shō: Kaijū Hagaba no Kessen)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP18)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Chapter 4: Ultraman Zero Arrives (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「第４章 ウルトラマンゼロ参上」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Dai Yon Shō: Urutoraman Zero Sanjō)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP19)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Final Chapter: Restore the Light of the Galaxy (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「最終章 よみがえれ銀河の光」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Saishū Shō: Yomigaere Ginga no Hikari)

programme.title: Ultraman Taiga The Movie (New Generation Climax)
programme.desc: Hiroyuki Kudo, working at the private security organization EGIS, has the power to transform into three Ultra Heroes: Taiga, Titas, and Fuma. Battling and defeating many enemies together, the bond between Hiroyuki and Taiga has deepened. However, someone has been targeting Hiroyuki. Noticing this, the New Generation Heroes come together to save him. Hikaru, Sho, Daichi, Gai, Riku, Katsumi, Isami, and even Taiga’s father Ultraman Taro have all come down to Earth. However, Ultraman Taro violently attacks his son Taiga. What happened to Taro? Will Taiga be able to fight against his father!? The New Generation Heroes now stand together to confront a bigger, darker power!

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy
programme.desc: Together with Ultraman Max, Ultraman Ribut senses a strange presence on a certain planet... However, it's a trap set by an enemy seeking revenge.

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP16 君は君のままで, Kimi wa Kimi no mama de)
programme.desc: "Humanity must not venture into space..." Kanata and the others struggle to take in those words, but just then the small monster Spinnie appears, and a TPU all-member operation begins to capture it. After all of their plans to capture it fail and Spinnie makes fun of him, Kanata vents by saying something horrible to Ryuumon...

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP17 Investigation from the Past 過去よりの調べ, Kako yori no Shirabe)
programme.desc: Captian Murahoshi is under investigation?! The Director of the TPU's Internal Affairs, Agent Nigel, suspects Captain and Agams might be working together. Kanata is shocked, but Nigel shows no mercy and looks for any suspicious acitivity from Murahoshi. Why doesn't Nigel trust Murahoshi? Is there any way to clear Captain's name?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP18 Invitation from Another Dimension 異次元からのいざない, I Jigen Kara no Izanai)
programme.desc: A sudden sinkhole appears in the city. Analysis shows it was caused by something beyond an average monster... Kanata, Ichika, and Ryumon head down to investigate where they encounter a mysterious shadow. Suddenly, Agams shows up again! Can Kanata keep his promise to save Agams?

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP19 Warriors on the Moon 月面の戦士たち, Getsumen no Senshi-tachi)
programme.desc: Kanata a.k.a. Ultraman Decker is thrown into another dimension by the extradimensional being Yapool! Just where in space has he been sent to? Kengo a.k.a. Ultraman Trigger comes to the rescue. Kanata and Kengo enjoy a moving reunion on the TPU's Lunar Base, but Yapool's evil reach isn't far behind...

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP20 Lord Ragon らごんさま, Ragon-sama)
programme.desc: An incident of an attacking from an unidentified monster takes place in a modern city, built where it which was once an ocean, Wadatsumi City!! Kaizaki and Ichika are immediately sent to investigate. The pair find a suspicious old woman, a mysterious girl, a crowd wearing peculiar masks, and a strange green creature. programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP19)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Final Chapter: Restore the Light of the Galaxy (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「最終章 よみがえれ銀河の光」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Saishū Shō: Yomigaere Ginga no Hikari)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP20)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 1: The Steel Army (キラー ザ ビートスター パート①「鋼鉄の軍団」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Wan - Kōtetsu no Gundan)

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP20. To Care and What Lies Beyond 想い、その先に, Omoi, Sono Sakini)
programme.desc: The Artificial Life Form M1, created by Chief Mechanic Kojiro Inaba's daughter Ruri, has malfunctioned and become gigantic! M1 doesn’t have bad intentions, but like this, it can do some serious damage! STORAGE puts a major operation into motion in order to stop M1 before it reaches the metropolitan area. Will they be able to save M1?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP21. D4, ディーフォー)
programme.desc: A new weapon has been developed from the recovered remains of Baraba that uses the abilities of the Extradimensional Being Yapool! Haruki and the others are against using this weapon’s terrible powers, but at that moment, the Brutal Space Monster Kelbim appears! The new weapon, “D4,” is equipped to King Joe STORAGE Custom. Will Yoko be able to pull the trigger?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP22. Individual Tomorrows それぞれの明日, Sorezore no Ashita)
programme.desc: As Haruki and Yoko are strolling through town, they once again run into the Space Pirate! Alien Barossa boasts that he will get his revenge for the defeat of his brothers. In the face of this powerful enemy’s attack, SC-1 Sevenger, which was headed for a museum, shows activity for the first time in a while!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP23. Prelude to a Nightmare 悪夢へのプレリュード, Akumu e no Pureryūdo)
programme.desc: STORAGE has developed the 4th Special Airborne Armor, Ultroid Zero, based on analysis of Ultraman! Yoko is chosen as its pilot, but on the day of its launch test, monsters begin to rampage all over the place! In the face of a monster attack of unprecedented scale, STORAGE unveils their most powerful robot to show off its true strength!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP24. The Game to Extinction 滅亡への遊戯, Metsubō e no Yūgi)
programme.desc: Juggler has finally revealed his true form to Haruki. Meanwhile, Celebro puts his final plan into motion. With their respective objectives out in the open, the situation takes a turn for the worse! As the shadow of despair creeps closer, their final enemy appears as a nightmare given shape!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP25. Warriors Shining Beyond 遥かに輝く戦士たち, Haruka ni Kagayaku Senshi-tachi)
programme.desc: In the face of a brutal assault by the formidable Destrudos, Haruki and Ultraman Z are gravely injured. Meanwhile, STORAGE attempts a desperate, all-out attack in order to rescue Yoko, who has fallen into the enemy’s clutches!

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP19)
programme.desc: Mega Monster Battle: Ultra Galaxy Legends - Final Chapter: Restore the Light of the Galaxy (大怪獣バトル ウルトラ銀河伝説 「最終章 よみがえれ銀河の光」, Daikaijū Batoru Urutora Ginga Densetsu - Saishū Shō: Yomigaere Ginga no Hikari)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP20)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 1: The Steel Army (キラー ザ ビートスター パート①「鋼鉄の軍団」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Wan - Kōtetsu no Gundan)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP21)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 2: The Steel Dictator (キラー ザ ビートスター パート②「鋼の独裁者」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Tsu - Hagane no Dokusai-sha)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP22)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 3: The Steel Tears (キラー ザ ビートスター パート③「鋼鉄の涙」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Tsu - Hagane no Namida)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP23)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero - Hero Retsuden (ウルトラマンゼロ 英雄列伝, Urutoraman Zero Eiyū Retsuden): The same as episode 79 of Ultraman Retsuden, this episode highlights clips from multiple Zero movies and specials

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP24)
programme.desc: Ultra Zero Fight - Shining Zero (Part 1) (ウルトラゼロファイト 輝きのゼロ（前編）, Urutora Zero Faito Kagayaki no Zero (Zenpen))

programme.title: Ultraman Taiga The Movie (New Generation Climax)
programme.desc: Hiroyuki Kudo, working at the private security organization EGIS, has the power to transform into three Ultra Heroes: Taiga, Titas, and Fuma. Battling and defeating many enemies together, the bond between Hiroyuki and Taiga has deepened. However, someone has been targeting Hiroyuki. Noticing this, the New Generation Heroes come together to save him. Hikaru, Sho, Daichi, Gai, Riku, Katsumi, Isami, and even Taiga’s father Ultraman Taro have all come down to Earth. However, Ultraman Taro violently attacks his son Taiga. What happened to Taro? Will Taiga be able to fight against his father!? The New Generation Heroes now stand together to confront a bigger, darker power!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP20 Lord Ragon らごんさま, Ragon-sama)
programme.desc: An incident of an attacking from an unidentified monster takes place in a modern city, built where it which was once an ocean, Wadatsumi City!! Kaizaki and Ichika are immediately sent to investigate. The pair find a suspicious old woman, a mysterious girl, a crowd wearing peculiar masks, and a strange green creature. Is this a place where myterious events gather?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP21 The Price of Prosperity 繁栄の代償, Han'ei no Daishō)
programme.desc: The S-Plasma fusion reactor is a new technology in development. The tremendous energy it could produce has the potential to allow humanity to reach the speed of light. However, this unknown energy source is concealed as a secret... Monsters are born, Agams' shadow squirms, and a truth is revealed. How will Kanata react to this crisis?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP22 The Fall of Bazdo 衰亡のバズド, Suibō no Bazudo)
programme.desc: Fugitive Agams suddenly reaches out to GUTS-Select and Captain Murahoshi is called to Agams’ hideout alone… Finally, Agams reveals the truth of the shocking events from the future timeline?! What does he mean by “Earthlings’ crime”? Can Kanata and GUTS-Select finally take Agams into custody?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP23. Prelude to a Nightmare 悪夢へのプレリュード, Akumu e no Pureryūdo)
programme.desc: STORAGE has developed the 4th Special Airborne Armor, Ultroid Zero, based on analysis of Ultraman! Yoko is chosen as its pilot, but on the day of its launch test, monsters begin to rampage all over the place! In the face of a monster attack of unprecedented scale, STORAGE unveils their most powerful robot to show off its true strength!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP20. To Care and What Lies Beyond 想い、その先に, Omoi, Sono Sakini)
programme.desc: The Artificial Life Form M1, created by Chief Mechanic Kojiro Inaba's daughter Ruri, has malfunctioned and become gigantic! M1 doesn’t have bad intentions, but like this, it can do some serious damage! STORAGE puts a major operation into motion in order to stop M1 before it reaches the metropolitan area. Will they be able to save M1?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP21. D4, ディーフォー)
programme.desc: A new weapon has been developed from the recovered remains of Baraba that uses the abilities of the Extradimensional Being Yapool! Haruki and the others are against using this weapon’s terrible powers, but at that moment, the Brutal Space Monster Kelbim appears! The new weapon, “D4,” is equipped to King Joe STORAGE Custom. Will Yoko be able to pull the trigger?!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP22. Individual Tomorrows それぞれの明日, Sorezore no Ashita)
programme.desc: As Haruki and Yoko are strolling through town, they once again run into the Space Pirate! Alien Barossa boasts that he will get his revenge for the defeat of his brothers. In the face of this powerful enemy’s attack, SC-1 Sevenger, which was headed for a museum, shows activity for the first time in a while!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP23. Prelude to a Nightmare 悪夢へのプレリュード, Akumu e no Pureryūdo)
programme.desc: STORAGE has developed the 4th Special Airborne Armor, Ultroid Zero, based on analysis of Ultraman! Yoko is chosen as its pilot, but on the day of its launch test, monsters begin to rampage all over the place! In the face of a monster attack of unprecedented scale, STORAGE unveils their most powerful robot to show off its true strength!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP24. The Game to Extinction 滅亡への遊戯, Metsubō e no Yūgi)
programme.desc: Juggler has finally revealed his true form to Haruki. Meanwhile, Celebro puts his final plan into motion. With their respective objectives out in the open, the situation takes a turn for the worse! As the shadow of despair creeps closer, their final enemy appears as a nightmare given shape!

programme.title: Ultraman Z (EP25. Warriors Shining Beyond 遥かに輝く戦士たち, Haruka ni Kagayaku Senshi-tachi)
programme.desc: In the face of a brutal assault by the formidable Destrudos, Haruki and Ultraman Z are gravely injured. Meanwhile, STORAGE attempts a desperate, all-out attack in order to rescue Yoko, who has fallen into the enemy’s clutches!

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP20)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 1: The Steel Army (キラー ザ ビートスター パート①「鋼鉄の軍団」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Wan - Kōtetsu no Gundan)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP21)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 2: The Steel Dictator (キラー ザ ビートスター パート②「鋼の独裁者」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Tsu - Hagane no Dokusai-sha)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP22)
programme.desc: Killer The Beatstar - Part 3: The Steel Tears (キラー ザ ビートスター パート③「鋼鉄の涙」, Kirā Za Bītosutā Pāto Tsu - Hagane no Namida)

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP23)
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero - Hero Retsuden (ウルトラマンゼロ 英雄列伝, Urutoraman Zero Eiyū Retsuden): The same as episode 79 of Ultraman Retsuden, this episode highlights clips from multiple Zero movies and specials

programme.title: Ultraman Zero: The Chronicle (EP24)
programme.desc: Ultra Zero Fight - Shining Zero (Part 1) (ウルトラゼロファイト 輝きのゼロ（前編）, Urutora Zero Faito Kagayaki no Zero (Zenpen))

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight: The Absolute Conspiracy
programme.desc: Together with Ultraman Max, Ultraman Ribut senses a strange presence on a certain planet... However, it's a trap set by an enemy seeking revenge.

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP20 Lord Ragon らごんさま, Ragon-sama)
programme.desc: An incident of an attacking from an unidentified monster takes place in a modern city, built where it which was once an ocean, Wadatsumi City!! Kaizaki and Ichika are immediately sent to investigate. The pair find a suspicious old woman, a mysterious girl, a crowd wearing peculiar masks, and a strange green creature. Is this a place where myterious events gather?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP21 The Price of Prosperity 繁栄の代償, Han'ei no Daishō)
programme.desc: The S-Plasma fusion reactor is a new technology in development. The tremendous energy it could produce has the potential to allow humanity to reach the speed of light. However, this unknown energy source is concealed as a secret... Monsters are born, Agams' shadow squirms, and a truth is revealed. How will Kanata react to this crisis?!

programme.title: Ultraman Decker (EP22 The Fall of Bazdo 衰亡のバズド, Suibō no Bazudo)
programme.desc: Fugitive Agams suddenly reaches out to GUTS-Select and Captain Murahoshi is called to Agams’ hideout alone… Finally, Agams reveals the truth of the shocking events from the future timeline?! What does he mean by “Earthlings’ crime”? Can Kanata and GUTS-Select finally take Agams into custody?!
